name: Rebrand LifterLMS
author: RebrandPress

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress(This will add new Sub Menu in admin panel’s side menu name Rebrand` under LifterLMS menu).
  3. Go to LifterLMS > Rebrand
sections.faq:
1. Is the Rebrand LifterLMS plugin free?
    -Yes, we have a lite version of the Rebrand X plugin with limited features. If you want to take advantage of all the premium features you’ll need to purchase a Pro license.

  2. Can you use the Rebrand LifterLMS plugin on the free version of LifterLMS?
    -Yes, it will work with both free version and pro version.

  3. Does it work with any WordPress theme?
    -Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

  4. Does it work with any WordPress page builder?
    -Yes, it will work with any WordPress page builder.

  5. How many websites can I connect Rebrand LifterLMS to?
    -You can connect the lite version to as many websites you would like. If you want to use the Pro features, you’ll have to select the plan that fits your needs best.

  6. Where can I get support?
    -You can post your question on the support forum here: https://help.rebrandpress.com
sections.description: LifterLMS is a Learning Management Plugin that helps you create and sell courses online without coding. With Rebrand LifterLMS, you can white label the plugin to change the name and description, while linking it to your own website instead of the developer’s. It also allows you to choose your own primary color for buttons and links, and add your own logo.

description: LifterLMS is a Learning Management Plugin that helps you create and sell courses online without coding. With Rebrand LifterLMS, you can white label the plugin to change the name and description, while linking it to your own website instead of the developer’s. It also allows you to choose your own primary color for buttons and links, and add your own logo.
